movie.title: Evil Things
movie.description_intro: Four kids take part in a pervert game - a torturer, the blog's master, four victims, none of them really innocent.
movie.description_full: Four kids take part in a pervert game - a torturer, the blog's master, four victims, none of them really innocent.

movies.title: Serena
movies.summary: In Depression-era North Carolina, the future of George Pemberton's timber empire becomes complicated when he marries Serena.
movies.description_full: In Depression-era North Carolina, the future of George Pemberton's timber empire becomes complicated when he marries Serena.
movies.synopsis: In Depression-era North Carolina, the future of George Pemberton's timber empire becomes complicated when he marries Serena.

movies.title: Over the Hedge
movies.summary: RJ, a raccoon who needs food, accidentally takes food from a hungry bear named Vincent and he wants his food to be found in exactly the same place in a week. He finally finds that an animal family, with a tortoise named Verne as their leader, could help him restore the food from the suburbia, the gateway to the good life. But little does RJ know, there is a woman who has recently hired an exterminator to try to hunt them down.
movies.description_full: RJ, a raccoon who needs food, accidentally takes food from a hungry bear named Vincent and he wants his food to be found in exactly the same place in a week. movies.title: A Coffee in Berlin
movies.summary: This tragicomedy is a self-ironic portrait of a young man who drops out of university and ends up wandering the streets of the city he lives: Berlin. The film deals with the desire to participate in life and the difficulty to find one's place.
movies.description_full: This tragicomedy is a self-ironic portrait of a young man who drops out of university and ends up wandering the streets of the city he lives: Berlin. The film deals with the desire to participate in life and the difficulty to find one's place.

movies.title: Run Silent Run Deep
movies.summary: The captain of a submarine sunk by the Japanese during WWII is finally given a chance to skipper another sub after a year of working a desk job. His singleminded determination for revenge against the destroyer that sunk his previous vessel puts his new crew in unneccessary danger.
movies.description_full: The captain of a submarine sunk by the Japanese during WWII is finally given a chance to skipper another sub after a year of working a desk job. His singleminded determination for revenge against the destroyer that sunk his previous vessel puts his new crew in unneccessary danger.
